description: Responsible for designing, delivering, and assessing an engaging K-6 Digital Literacy and ICT curriculum, focusing on foundational software skills, visual coding (e.g., Scratch), and promoting safe Digital Citizenship while maintaining an effective computer lab environment.

Creating a full-stack web project by implementing the MERN system: MongoDB for the database, Express for the backend API, React.js for the frontend display, all of which run within the Node.js application.

Performing internet network installation to customers both installation outside and inside the building. Perform computer repairs by reinstalling and also cleaning the virus. Work with 10 people in a team.
